      抛出MinecraftException的net.minecraft.world中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void World.checkSessionLock()
      Checks whether the session lock file was modified by another process
      void WorldServer.saveAllChunks​(boolean all, IProgressUpdate progressCallback)
      Saves all chunks to disk while updating progress bar.
      protected void WorldServer.saveLevel()
      Saves the chunks to disk.
      protected void WorldServerMulti.saveLevel()
      Saves the chunks to disk.
